title: Implement creative fatigue detection
description:
Function to flag fatigued creatives based on signals.

## Fatigue Signals
| Signal | Threshold | Action |
|--------|-----------|--------|
| High frequency | > 3x account avg | Refresh or expand targeting |
| CTR decline | > 30% drop over 7 days | Test new headline/image |
| Rising CPC | > 50% increase over 7 days | Creative losing relevance |
| Stale runtime | > 30 days same creative | Test fresh variation |

## Implementation
```python
def detect_creative_fatigue(ad_data: dict, account_metrics: dict) -> dict:
    signals = []
    
    # High frequency
    if ad_data['frequency'] > account_metrics['avg_frequency'] * 3:
        signals.append({
            'signal': 'high_frequency',
            'value': ad_data['frequency'],
            'threshold': account_metrics['avg_frequency'] * 3,
            'suggestion': 'Refresh creative or expand targeting'
        })

    return {
        'is_fatigued': len(signals) > 0,
        'signals': signals
    }
```
